alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:09AM MST until January 18 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 MPH. * WHERE...Locations including but not limited to Shoshone, Richfield, Carey, Rupert, Burley, Oakley, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley and Fort Hall. * WHEN...through 2 PM Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Warmer temperatures across portions of the Magic Valley and Lower Snake Plain should greatly reduce the risk of blowing and drifting snow during the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain
